mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POKEMON (SEQ, NAME, WEIGHT, HEIGHT, BASE_EXPERIENCE, FRONT_IMAGE, BACK_IMAGE, RAW_DATA, NAME_KR, DESCRIPTION, TYPE1, TYPE2) VALUES (#{seq}, #{name}, #{weight}, #{height}, #{baseExperience}, #{frontImage}, #{backImage}, #{rawData}, #{nameKr}, #{description}, #{type1}, #{type2})
mapper.select: SELECT P.SEQ, ROWNUM NUM, P.NAME, P.NAME_KR, P.WEIGHT, P.HEIGHT, P.BASE_EXPERIENCE, P.FRONT_IMAGE, P.BACK_IMAGE, P.RAW_DATA, P.DESCRIPTION, P.TYPE1, P.TYPE2 FROM POKEMON P WHERE P.seq=#{seq}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POKEMON
AND NAME || NAME_KR || DESCRIPTION LIKE #{keyword}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT P.SEQ, ROWNUM NUM, P.NAME, P.NAME_KR, P.WEIGHT, P.HEIGHT, P.BASE_EXPERIENCE, P.FRONT_IMAGE, P.BACK_IMAGE, P.RAW_DATA, P.DESCRIPTION, P.TYPE1, P.TYPE2 FROM POKEMON P ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE(0, 2000)) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT P.SEQ, ROWNUM NUM, P.NAME, P.NAME_KR, P.WEIGHT, P.HEIGHT, P.BASE_EXPERIENCE, P.FRONT_IMAGE, P.BACK_IMAGE, P.RAW_DATA, P.DESCRIPTION, P.TYPE1, P.TYPE2 FROM MY_POKEMON M INNER JOIN POKEMON P ON M.SEQ = P.SEQ WHERE M.USER_NO=#{userNo} ORDER BY P.NAME_KR
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MY_POKEMON WHERE USER_NO=#{userNo} AND SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ FROM MY_POKEMON WHERE USER_NO=#{userNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MY_POKEMON WHERE USER_NO=#{userNo} AND SEQ=#{seq}
